# promotional

**Type Property**

A promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.

## Declaration

```swift
static let promotional: Product.SubscriptionOffer.OfferType
```

## Discussion

For more information about promotional offers, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/manage-subscriptions/set-up-promotional-offers-for-auto-renewable-subscriptions].

## Getting offer types

- **introductory**: An introductory offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
- **winBack**: A win-back offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
